message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR 

The paper presents an approach based on feed-forward neural networks for learning the distribution of textual documents. This approach is inspired by the Neural Autoregressive Distribution Estimator (NADE) model, which is a machine learning model. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper deals with textual data and discusses how NADE can be adapted to the case of textual data. Therefore, it can also be categorized under cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses how the approach can be used to learn deep representations of documents, which can be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses how the approach can be combined with a regular neural network N-gram model, which can be categorized under cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
